name: Warp Tennis (Fring Frang)
description:
INSTRUCTIONS: Throw the tennis ball into the shiny blue goal to reach the next level

Controls: W A S D to move; Mouse to control camera; Hold left click to throw; Release left click to WARP

DISCLAIMER: This is a student project for a game design assignment at the Cologne Game Lab. This is pretty janky since I'm not so great at Unity. Thanks Lars and Daniel for the help!
